Package nl.pim16aap2.testing.logging

Record Class LogAssertionsUtil.ThrowableSpec

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
nl.pim16aap2.testing.logging.LogAssertionsUtil.ThrowableSpec
Record Components:
expectedType - The expected type of the exception.
expectedMessage - The expected message of the exception.
stringCompareMethod - The method to use when comparing the expected and actual messages.
Enclosing class:
LogAssertionsUtil
public static record LogAssertionsUtil.ThrowableSpec(Class<?> expectedType, @Nullable String expectedMessage, LogAssertionsUtil.MessageComparisonMethod stringCompareMethod) extends Record
Represents a specification for an expected exception.

This is used to specify the expected type of an exception and its message.

If the message is null, it will not be checked when comparing this specification to a throwable.

  • Constructor Details

    • ThrowableSpec

      public ThrowableSpec(Class<?> expectedType, @Nullable String expectedMessage)
      Creates a new instance of the exception specification.

      Defaults to LogAssertionsUtil.MessageComparisonMethod.EQUALS for the message comparison.

      Parameters:
      expectedType - The expected type of the exception.
      expectedMessage - The expected message of the exception.

    • ThrowableSpec

      public ThrowableSpec(Class<?> expectedType)
      Creates a new instance of the exception specification.

      Sets the expected message to null, meaning it will not be checked when comparing this specification to a throwable.

      Parameters:
      expectedType - The expected type of the exception.

    • ThrowableSpec

      public ThrowableSpec(Class<?> expectedType, @Nullable String expectedMessage, LogAssertionsUtil.MessageComparisonMethod stringCompareMethod)
      Creates an instance of a ThrowableSpec record class.
      Parameters:
      expectedType - the value for the expectedType record component
      expectedMessage - the value for the expectedMessage record component
      stringCompareMethod - the value for the stringCompareMethod record component

  • Method Details

    • matches

      @Contract(value="null -> false", pure=true) public boolean matches(@Nullable Throwable throwable)
      Checks whether the throwable matches the specification.
      Parameters:
      throwable - The throwable to check.
      Returns:
      True if the throwable matches the specification, false otherwise.

    • messageMatches

      public boolean messageMatches(@Nullable String message)
      Checks whether the message matches the expected message.

      If the expected message is null, this method will always return true.

      Parameters:
      message - The message to check.
      Returns:
      True if the message matches, false otherwise.

    • of

      public static LogAssertionsUtil.ThrowableSpec[] of(Class<?>... classes)
      Creates an array of ThrowableSpecs from the provided classes.

      See ThrowableSpec(Class).

      Parameters:
      classes - The classes to create the ThrowableSpecs from.
      Returns:
      The array of ThrowableSpecs.
